Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20149 affecting package js-jquery for versions less than 3.5.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-20149 affecting package js-jquery for versions less than 3.5.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package js-jquery is earlier than 3.5.0-4, affected by CVE-2019-20149
